property.name: stackRegions
property.label: Stack Regions
property.description: Specify which the form factor will produce a responsive stacked behavior.

property.name: regionCount
property.label: Number of Regions
property.description: Select the number of regions to render.

property.name: regionSizing
property.label: Region Sizing (must be a number from 1-12, one per region, comma separated)
property.description: A comma separated set of numbers (1-12) representing the size for each region. All numbers should add up to 12 for each row.

property.name: verticalAlignment
property.label: Vertical Alignment
property.description: The default vertical alignment of content for all regions.

property.label: CSS Classes
property.name: classNames
property.description: Class names to uniquely target the component's styles.
